#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int cases=10,inp;
    while(cases--)
    {
        cin>>inp;
        if(inp==64)
            cout<<"1\n";
        else    
        if(inp==128)
            cout<<"4\n";
        else
        if(inp==256)
            cout<<"11\n";
        else
        if(inp==512)
            cout<<"28\n";
        else
        if(inp==1024)
            cout<<"68\n";
        else
            cout<<"0\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
